query:
ALTER TABLE videoScenario
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hookContent TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hookPurpose TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS problemContent TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS problemContext TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS solutionContent TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS solutionBenefits TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctaContent TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctaPurpose TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hookSeconds INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS problemSeconds INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS solutionSeconds INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctaSeconds INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalSeconds INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ragReferencesJson TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS userRulesJson TEXT
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hookContent TEXT,
